title: Cleansing Kharsan
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship frees spirits and gains new allies
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship is celebrated as heroes in Uzgukhar after the Battle for Uzgukhar and the unveiling of Riswynn's statue.
Wellby recovers from death, Kenzo observes the Dunmari new year, and orc sisters Nuzkar and Aygul join the crew.
The party explores the abandoned city of Kharsan, encounters specters and discovers Grash's plans to attack Dunmar.
Kenzo and Riswynn perform a cleansing ritual burning the orc warren, freeing trapped souls with Bhishma's aid.
The party reaches Pava and Avaras' House, meets Kethra, and considers intervening in the situation in Dunmar.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship is honored in Uzgukhar, explores and cleanses Kharsan, and gains new members while contemplating their next move.
